name: Spartacus Adventure
description:
Description
Spartacus Adventure is a 2D platformer, action,adventure game. You must escape the gladiator's prison cell, escape to the woods and reach the summit of the mountain to defeat the Roman General who put you in the prison in the first place.

Features
- Begin your journey in a prison cell where you have to shoot the Roman prison guards using flaming arrows.
- Once you’ve escaped the prison who will run to the woods where other Roam guards are standing in your way to your freedom
- Travel to the summit of the mountain where the general of the Roman Army lies as your final boss.
- Use every combat skill and tricks to defeat the final boss.
- The boss will show no mercy to anyone who does not submit to the Roman Empire.

Sites, Price and Time
@itch.io (FREE)
https://tehgyukim.itch.io/spartacus-adventure
@gamejolt (FREE)
https://gamejolt.com/games/spartacusadventure/727748
Released on 30/6/2022

Developer Information:
Teh Gyu Kim (MDS student)

Contact: Teh.Kim@mds.ac.nz

Biography:
I am a first year student who has made a 2D platformer game using all the lessons taught in class during the first semester of 2022. Spartacus Adventure is the very first game I have made. However, I shall be making more games in the future.
